G

GenePool - Class in <Unnamed>
This class resembels a database file for all possible organisms in the game.
GenePool() - Constructor for class GenePool
Constructor for objects of class GenePool
generateID() - Method in class GenePool
Generate a unique ID for the organism using it's unchanging fields: maxHealthPoints + ":" + breedingCycle + two first letters of name + hitByFire.
generateMaxOrganismsAtStart() - Method in class Map
Generate the maximum number of organisms allowed upon initialization of the ecosystem.

MotherNature - Class in <Unnamed>
Mother Nature (or MN) is the algorithm in charge of enforcing the rules of reproduction, movement consumption, damage and death of all organisms over the Map.
MotherNature() - Constructor for class MotherNature

O

Organism - Class in <Unnamed>
Organism class hold the structure for every organism in the Ecosystem.

P

printGrid() - Method in class Map
Prints out a grid with it's current state in the following format: x,y-totalOrganismsPerPoint.
